system.requirement: After you @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.ironswornmoves.Item.725a21e2f02d7e12]{Fulfill Your Vow} to be found worthy of Mjolnir, quest to find it, and wield it...

abilities.description: When you @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.ironswornmoves.Item.7e008d0f656dc8b3]{Clash} and score a weak hit, you may inflict no harm to knock your foe back with a clap of thunder. If you do, you have the initiative.

When you @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.ironswornmoves.Item.5288e935906f6d28]{Strike} and score a strong hit, you may call forth a blast of lightning. If you do, focus on the righteousness of your cause and roll +heart. On a hit, inflict X harm and take +X momentum. On a strong hit, X is 2. On a weak hit, X is 1.

When you @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.ironswornmoves.Item.aac3783710ad7499]{End the Fight} by slamming Mjolnir to the ground releasing a wave of lightning and thunder, subtract -1 from each challenge die. On a weak hit or miss, you suffer collateral damage in addition to the other consequences.
